answers.answer: hi it sounds like water retention fluid and have you been tested for diabetes
What happens when you elevate your feet?  Ice them?  Soak them in Epsom salts?

question: when i was 15, my left foot started swelling which was weird coz i had not been involved in any accident or had any insect bites. gradually my right foot also started swelling though both were painless. I have been in and out of hospitals and have had tests on  my blood, kidneys, lymphatic system and doctors conclude that my body is normal. Am now 24 and still have no idea what causes this swelling
title: Swelling on feet
